HeadComp.title: MSG91 - Our team, culture and happy clients.
HeadComp.description: Empowering developers with communication APIs. Building modern communication tools and supporting ideas for startups and enterprises globally.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs Interakt
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and Interakt both provide WhatsApp Business API solutions for customer communication. While Interakt focuses on CRM functionalities and sales workflows over WhatsApp, MSG91 offers a wider suite with AI automation, chatbot building, and omnichannel campaign tools. Both platforms support customer engagement, but MSG91 is ideal for businesses looking for an all-in-one communication and marketing platform.

content.name: Interakt
content.des: Interakt is a WhatsApp Business API platform focused on helping SMBs with CRM-style features like lead management, shared inbox, and basic campaign tools. It’s user-friendly and suited for businesses looking to manage customer conversations primarily on WhatsApp.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91 offers a broader communication ecosystem designed for scale. Alongside WhatsApp, it provides AI-powered automation, customer journey flows, bot creation using natural English prompts, and omnichannel capabilities including SMS, Email, and RCS. With advanced features, localized pricing, and 24/7 support, MSG91 is ideal for brands that want more than just messaging — a platform to automate, engage, and grow.

features.pricing: 2499 Per Month along with additional charges on per credit - Marketing: ₹0.871 Utility: ₹0.150 Authentication: ₹0.128
features.omnichannel_communication: Omnichannel Inbox - whatsapp and instagram only
features.ai_chatbot_integration: Drag & Drop Chatbot Builder & GPT Chatbot
features.whatsapp_payments: yes whatsapp payment support through PayU and Razorpay
features.otp_widget: OTP verification through whatsapp business api
features.one_click_verification: Authentication templates include option autofill otp or copy otp code
features.unified_platform: one platform for whatsapp api, whatsapp & instagram automation, chatbot, whatsapp flows and analytics
features.customer_support_quality: Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM
features.omnichannel_chatbot_support: Offer chatbot customer service across WhatsApp & Instagram

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
